ing: 1/2 cup prepared pulled pork with barbecue sauce, warmed
2 small jalapeno peppers, each cut into 12 slices
des: "Ritz crackers are topped with coleslaw, warm pulled pork, and a slice of jalapeno pepper for a party-pleasing appetizer."
ins: Top crackers with coleslaw, pulled pork, and jalapeno pepper slice.
